scripts.compile: eosiocpp -o KingOfEOS.wast KingOfEOS.cpp && eosiocpp -g KingOfEOS.abi KingOfEOS.cpp
scripts.wallet: cleos wallet open -n default && cleos wallet unlock -n default <<< 'PW5Jg7BGGbdk1Sb3P91kFWeNf7F28xjHYmHd3yiY1TpR5x6jERCsK'
scripts.deploy: npm run compile && cleos set contract kingofeos ../contract KingOfEOS.wast KingOfEOS.abi -p kingofeos
scripts.transfer: cleos push action eosio.token transfer '[ "eosio", "kingofeos", "0.0001 EOS", "agg55hwd" ]' -p eosio
